name: Indian Doll - Fashion Makeover Games For Girls
name_original: Indian Doll - Fashion Makeover Games For Girls
description:
Help to Indian girl Wedding l to look beauty with new fashion stylist. Indian Fashion Doll Salon present indian makeup and costume.like Indian Wedding Salon
Every indian princess doll want to look like bridal fashion girls in her own indian theme wedding salon.
Help her to look fabulous in Indian wedding and She always want to look fashionable. Help her to look fabulous in her own Wedding! Indian Fashion Doll is getting ready to go for her Fashion Show!

Game Features:-
-Spa
  - Makeup
  - Dress up

# Spa

Apply unique and beautiful face packs to make Fashion Doll Girl look more beautiful!
Remove her pimples, extra eye brow hairs, under eye marks, black dots and give her a clean and

# Make-up

Help Indian Doll to look beautiful with unique Hairstyle and Make-up
- Give her delightful look with beautiful hairstyle; you can change the hair color by sliding the color option
-Give her Fashion look with beautiful makeup.
-Give American Doll more stunning look with unique eye shadows and glow.
-Make her cheeks more charming with unique cheek glow options
- Change her eye color to make her look more stunning
- Fashion Doll wedding make up would be incomplete without attractive lipsticks and lip glow
- Choose a eye brow color from options to make her look better

# Dress up

We have specially created unique outfits to give your Fashion Girl to a perfect stunning and
charming indian look!
Accessorizes her look with sandals, lots of fun jewelry like earring, necklace, nose ring, waist ring, bindi and much more.
Choose a dress for your Indian Fashion Doll from bunch of options.
Change the background and give a blissful look!
